summary: Evgeniy's hobby is to send fake letters to real countries. He has collected a letter from every country except New Zealand, and he sends a letter there. Things turn worst when he actually receives a letter from someone there.
cast: Kevin Spacey|Alanna Ubach|David Meunier|Anthony Skordi|Cody Caira|Mike Dirksen|Andrei Gajzago
title: Envelope
